name: Glorial Eternal (All Series)
description:
Download now for Android (or emulator) the Glorial Eternal Series! All titles in one! The GE (Glorial Eternal) series comprises first and third person Action and Adventure games. In the games "Glorial Eternal: Mirage" and "Glorial Eternal: Prophecy" the player must rise in points to gain strength, power, speed, and jump and with time the enemies get stronger, the Mirage and Prophecy titles are more amateur games however, they are extremely fun, in later titles such as "Glorial Eternal: Ocean War" and "Glorial Eternal: Battle" the games become professional and bring new graphics in addition to being online multiplayer (which is optional).

The upcoming titles revealed by SwankyNoob (Glorial Eternal: Infinity, and Glorial Eternal: Bazir) will be part of a separate (also free) release called "Glorial Eternal: Twice".
